Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to generate code-based actions with natural language in prompt builder and within an agent in AI Builder. This feature will reach general availability on July 15, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature enables end-to-end business process execution without the need for manual sequential workflows to perform complex mathematical calculations. You can automate complex operations like writing actions to Dataverse, sending emails, and creating CRM cases. This reduces the need for large language model calls, resulting in increased efficiency for agent systems.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit the Generate code-based actions with natural language in prompt builder and within an agent article.

Title: AI Builder â€“ Generate code-based actions with natural language in prompt builder and within an agent
